text: Area code 308 is an area code for Nebraska. It was created as a split to area code 402 in 1954. It covers the western portion of the state, while 402 covers the eastern portion. As of now, it is projected to not exhaust until at least 2050.https://nationalnanpa.com/reports/2020-1_NPA_Exhaust_Projections_Final.pdf == References == Category:Nebraska 308
title: Area code 308
